::Zardus::

Zardus exits the Alliance base, looking at Feline and Skulletron as they 
depart. He activates his comm-link, setting it on an Alliance frequency. He 
turns around, heading for the lab. Reptilica had sent him a transmission that 
a new soldier was waiting to be programmed there.....
